name: Shouse - Collective Ecstasy Live!
description: Australian electronic duo Shouse brings their 'Collective Ecstasy' tour to Berlin's Maschinenhaus. The act behind the viral global hit 'Love Tonight' represents a fascinating collision of underground house music and mainstream breakthrough. Their visceral, euphoric live performances transform club anthems into stadium-ready experiences, making this a rare chance to witness dance music crossing boundaries in real time.
